thread.title: BRIEF-ADT Inc's Units Enters Into Incremental Assumption, Amendment Agreement No. 6

title: BRIEF-ADT Inc's Units Enters Into Incremental Assumption, Amendment Agreement No. 6
text: 17 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-ADT Inc's Units Enters Into Incremental Assumption, Amendment Agreement No. 6 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   ADT Inc: * ADT INC SAYS ON MARCH 16, 2018 UNITS ENTERED INTO INCREMENTAL ASSUMPTION, AMENDMENT AGREEMENT NO. 6 - SEC FILING * ADT INC SAYS INCREMENTAL AGREEMENT AMENDED AND RESTATED FIFTH AMENDED AND RESTATED FIRST LIEN CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF JULY 1, 2015 * ADT INC - ENTERS ‍REPLACEMENT REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY WITH COMMITMENT OF UP TO $350 MILLION​ * ADT INC - ‍REPLACEMENT REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY HAS A MATURITY DATE OF MARCH 16, 2023​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2G5qfSI
